title: Classic Leather Jacket
description: Timeless leather jacket crafted from premium full-grain leather. Features a classic silhouette with modern tailoring for the perfect fit.

title: Cashmere Blend Sweater
description: Luxuriously soft cashmere blend sweater with a relaxed fit. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

title: Tailored Wool Trousers
description: Elegant wool trousers with a tailored fit. Features a high waist and straight leg for a sophisticated silhouette.

title: Minimalist Canvas Tote
description: Durable canvas tote bag with leather handles. Spacious interior with multiple pockets for organization.

title: Silk Button-Down Shirt
description: Elegant silk shirt with mother-of-pearl buttons. Lightweight and breathable for year-round wear.

title: Premium Denim Jeans
description: High-quality selvedge denim with a modern slim fit. Crafted for durability and comfort.

title: Merino Wool Cardigan
description: Soft merino wool cardigan with horn buttons. Perfect for transitional weather and layering.

title: Leather Chelsea Boots
description: Classic Chelsea boots in supple Italian leather. Features elastic side panels and a comfortable sole.

title: Linen Summer Dress
description: Breezy linen dress perfect for warm weather. Features a relaxed fit with subtle pleating details.

title: Structured Blazer
description: Impeccably tailored blazer with a modern cut. Perfect for both professional and casual occasions.

title: Cotton Oxford Shirt
description: Classic Oxford shirt in premium cotton. A wardrobe essential with timeless appeal.

title: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Compact leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap. Perfect for everyday essentials.
